Wow, what a piece of shit compared to the original Word Racing. The physics have been ruined, and it's just not even close to as fun to drive. They turned what could've been a great sequel into a steaming pile of arcade shit. I've never been so disappointed. 

It's been a few years since I played World Racing, so I nabbed it yesterday, and decided to give the sequel a try today to see if it was any better. Holy shit, what a waste of bandwidth. This could've been such a great game if they'd just stuck with the characteristics that made the original so great. Typical folly made my a dieing software developer that tried to bring in more cash by raping it's best titled of what made it so great in the first place.

And "viperjago"... this release works just fine. Get your head out of your ass and make sure you know what you're talking about before you spread mis-information. The game might suck balls compared to the original, but this release does in fact work.
